entry.title: First version with built desktop app

link.title: First version with built desktop app

entry.content:
Version 1.0.1.0 is the first version of Dododo that comes with built desktop app packages.

Since Dododo was created, it was aimed to be a web game. Fortunately, with the help of NW.js, it is possible to wrap the game into a self-contained desktop app. There is a script to help you to build the desktop app.

Now, I am happy to announce that since version 1.0.1.0, every release (not including pre-releases) comes with built desktop app packages for Windows and Linux. You can download the desktop app packages from the releases page. Installation is as simple as extracting them to anywhere you want.

For details about desktop apps, see the wiki page.
entry.summary: Version 1.0.1.0 is the first version of Dododo that comes with built desktop app packages.
